body:
i change bert config.json vocab_size = 30522 , make success!
but a new problem is i don't have a vocabulary of size 30522. can you provide oneï¼Ÿ after, i will share torch bin model.
thank you very muchï¼

> i change bert config.json vocab_size = 30522 , make success! but a new problem is i don't have a vocabulary of size 30522. can you provide oneï¼Ÿ after, i will share torch bin model. thank you very muchï¼

Is there any time need the vocabulary which size of 30522?   Cause i download the 'bert-base-uncased' which is the pytorch version, and it's config show that "vocab_size": 30522...   Also, i have fine-tune the bert model to train QQP dataset, and don't need use such that vocabulary...

> i change bert config.json vocab_size = 30522 , make success! but a new problem is i don't have a vocabulary of size 30522. can you provide oneï¼Ÿ after, i will share torch bin model. thank you very muchï¼

Also, can i ask to have the pytorch version pre-trained model....looking forward to your apply!

> > i change bert config.json vocab_size = 30522 , make success! but a new problem is i don't have a vocabulary of size 30522. can you provide oneï¼Ÿ after, i will share torch bin model. thank you very muchï¼
> 
> Is there any time need the vocabulary which size of 30522? Cause i download the 'bert-base-uncased' which is the pytorch version, and it's config show that "vocab_size": 30522... Also, i have fine-tune the bert model to train QQP dataset, and don't need use such that vocabulary...

OOO, I figure it out!  When making dataloader, may have to use that!
You can get it from https://huggingface.co/bert-base-uncased/blob/main/vocab.txt
Hope this can help you 
As for loading data, I think tranformer's tokenizer is a very good tool...Recommend!
